## MapProps type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MapProps<TBaseElement> = {
    instrument?: (impl: MapFactory<TBaseElement>['impl'], instrumentation: InstrumentationContext, context: ServiceContext) => MapFactory<TBaseElement>['impl'];
};
```
